author: jorton
msg: Add 's' format tag to mod_headers to allow access to mod_ssl variables
without the overhead of SSLOptions +StdEnvVars/+ExportCertData; also
ensure that any multi-line envvars are unwrapped onto a single line.

author: nd
msg: when parsing a conditional expression, don't assume the first
Reviewed by: Jeff Trawick, Justin Erenkrantz

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Eliminate a Sleep(100) that always occurs on certain errors on AcceptEx(). Apply err_count threshold to all AcceptEx error conditions.
